name: Move The Ball
description:
This is a new Puzzle game created by Young Stars, the creator of "16 Squares" and "Jelly Blaster Legend" (Jelly Blast) games!

HOW TO PLAY
►Move the blocks with your fingertip to create an optimal path for your ball to roll to the finish line!
►Aim to reach for the perfect 3-star rating on each level to set a new record!

-Move the Ball is available on mobile phones & tablet PCs. 
-Move the Ball contains ads varying from banners, interstitials, videos to house ads. 
-Move the Ball is free to play, however, you may purchase in-app items, such as Ad-free & coins.

Features
- FREE GAME and NO INTERNET.
- Currently the game has 100+ levels. And more.
- Music and graphics in game are funny.
- Keep progress game on server.
- Share with friends.
- Easy and fun to start but a challenge to fully master.
***************************************************************************
Download Move the Ball now to start your saga! Enjoy!
***************************************************************************
